function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited EU health mandate hindered public health responses to COVID-19","Impact":"Sluggish and limited EU early response to the pandemic crisis","Mitigation":"Expand the EU health mandate to include more authority over public health responses","Technologies":"Policy and governance frameworks","People":"European Union, Member States","Owner":"European Union, Member States"},{"Description":"Global epicentre of the pandemic shifting to Europe","Impact":"Increased burden on European healthcare systems and resources","Mitigation":"Enhance coordination and collaboration among European countries for a unified response","Technologies":"Communication and data sharing platforms","People":"European countries, healthcare providers","Owner":"European countries, healthcare organizations"},{"Description":"Slow and haphazard initial reaction by the EU","Impact":"Criticism of the EU's effectiveness in managing the pandemic crisis","Mitigation":"Implement effective crisis management protocols and response strategies","Technologies":"Crisis management tools and communication systems","People":"European Union, national governments","Owner":"European Union, national governments"}]}
